description:
About this Course:

Music Production: FL Studio for Beginners introduces FL Studio 12, to its students.

About FL STUDIO:

FL STUDIO is one of the leading Music Production Software in the world. Using FL Studio, we can compose and create a song. It is from a company called IMAGE-LINE SOFTWARE.

Students may download the evaluation version from their website and use it for free. The evaluation version comes with some restrictions though.

Course Structure:

This course is for absolute beginners who would like to get started in Computer based Music Composition.

This course introduces the basic operations, MIDI Configuration, User Interface, Song Structure and 'Navigating various options within FL Studio' to its students.

This is Part I of the series.
title: Music Production: FL Studio for Absolute Beginners - Part I
